channel.title: MoonlightScape v3.1 [New Features, New Events] [5K+ DOWNLOADS]
channel.description:
[size=24pt][b]Moonlightscape v3.1[/b][/size] [sub]Take in mind this is a BETA version and will later be edited...[/sub]
Now with source + client downloads.
[img]http://i87.servimg.com/u/f87/13/27/92/47/vote10.png[/img][b]Source[/b]: http://uppit.com/v/EHZB8H46 [img]http://i87.servimg.com/u/f87/13/27/92/47/websit10.png[/img][b]Client[/b]: http://www.msdownload.tk http://www.mediafire.com/?htmzwuend2o
[b][u]Updates:[/u][/b] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Energy pots, 25% run energy each gulp [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]PkPoint System (5 Points Per Kill)
[b][u]Features:[/u][/b] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Good Stability (Can hold 2000+minutes uptime!) [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Good Combat System [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Full Wildy Levels [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Several PvP-Spots [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Good combat training [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]1100Xp Per Hit! [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]All Skills Work! [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Good xp rates [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]All specials work [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Quest Tab = Info Tab [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Magic Tab = Teleport Tab [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Shops spread around Varrock [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Working Equipment Interface [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]New Attack Interface [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]New Option Interface [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]The real godsword GFX & Animations [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Godwars bosses: General Graardor, Kril Tsutsaroth, Commander Zilyana & KreeArra [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Many training spots! [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Minigames: Pest control, barrows & assault! (Good Rewards!) [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Fast Money making:Thieving, Crafting, Smithing & RuneCrafting is good money! [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Many npcdialogues included! [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]Working Vengeance [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vxk7k9.gif[/img]ClanChat with working buttons!
[img]http://i87.servimg.com/u/f87/13/27/92/47/moonli12.png[/img]
[img]http://i17.servimg.com/u/f17/13/27/92/47/x10.jpg[/img] V2 Client..
[img]http://i17.servimg.com/u/f17/13/27/92/47/title10.jpg[/img] V3 Client...
[img]http://i87.servimg.com/u/f87/13/27/92/47/purple10.jpg[/img] Customs...
[img]http://i87.servimg.com/u/f87/13/27/92/47/agsmax11.jpg[/img] Armadyl Godsword spec...
[img]http://i17.servimg.com/u/f17/13/27/92/47/home10.jpg[/img] Home of MoonlightScape
[img]http://i17.servimg.com/u/f17/13/27/92/47/train10.jpg[/img] Train Zone with new monsters!
[img]http://i17.servimg.com/u/f17/13/27/92/47/skills10.jpg[/img] Skill zone to be edited
[img]http://i17.servimg.com/u/f17/13/27/92/47/godwar10.jpg[/img] Godwars with new BANK, only 10 kill count needed!
[img]http://i17.servimg.com/u/f17/13/27/92/47/beast10.jpg[/img] All new Spirit Beast!
[img]http://i17.servimg.com/u/f17/13/27/92/47/donato10.jpg[/img] Donators receive special feature...

item.title: MoonlightScape v3.1 [New Features, New Events] [5K+ DOWNLOADS]
item.dc:creator: @Yoyomonchien Yoyomonchien
item.description:
@Yoyomonchien wrote:

[size=24pt]Moonlightscape v3.1[/size]
[sub]Take in mind this is a BETA version and will later be edited…[/sub]

Now with source + client downloads.

Source: http://uppit.com/v/EHZB8H46
Client:
http://www.msdownload.tk
http://www.mediafire.com/?htmzwuend2o

Updates:
Energy pots, 25% run energy each gulp
PkPoint System (5 Points Per Kill)

Features:
Good Stability (Can hold 2000+minutes uptime!)
Good Combat System
Full Wildy Levels
Several PvP-Spots
Good combat training
1100Xp Per Hit!
All Skills Work!
Good xp rates
All specials work
Quest Tab = Info Tab
Magic Tab = Teleport Tab
Shops spread around Varrock
Working Equipment Interface
New Attack Interface
New Option Interface
The real godsword GFX & Animations
Godwars bosses: General Graardor, Kril Tsutsaroth, Commander Zilyana & KreeArra
Many training spots!
Minigames: Pest control, barrows & assault! (Good Rewards!)
Fast Money making:Thieving, Crafting, Smithing & RuneCrafting is good money!
Many npcdialogues included!
Working Vengeance
ClanChat with working buttons!
